testsuite.name: testCases.TC014_PlaceOrderRegisterWhileCheckout
testsuite.system-out: Navigating to baseURL: http://automationexercise.com Home Page is displayed successfully Step 1-3: Navigate to home page and verify step 4-6:Add products to cart, Click 'Cart' button, Verify that cart page is displayed step 7-8: Click Proceed To Checkout, Click 'Register / Login' button Clicked on Signup link 'New User Signup!'- is visible Entered username Entered Email clicked on Signup step 9: Fill all details in Signup and create account Filled account details Clicked on Create Account Verify 'ACCOUNT CREATED!' and click 'Continue' button, Verify ' Logged in as username' at top step 10-11: Verify 'ACCOUNT CREATED!' and click 'Continue' button, Verify ' Logged in as username' at top step 12-14:Click 'Cart' button, Click 'Proceed To Checkout' button, Verify Address Details and Review Your Order step 15: Enter description in comment text area and click 'Place Order' step 16-17: Enter payment details: Name on Card, Card Number, CVC, Expiration date, Click 'Pay and Confirm Order' button step 18: Verify success message 'Your order has been placed successfully! click on deleteAccount click on continue Deleted the account and the HomePagedisplaced Click 'Delete Account' button, Verify 'ACCOUNT DELETED!' and click 'Continue' button
